name: Mount Royal Hotel

reviews.title: Do not stay in this hotel
reviews.text: Despite the good location, DO NOT stay in this hotel if you are looking for a quiet and relaxing holiday with the desire to sleep between the hours of 1am and 7am.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although staff did offer to move us to a quieter room, the rooms offered were of a lower grade than we had paid for and were filthy.
reviews.title: Location, location, location!

reviews.text: This hotel is in need of a serious renovation,
reviews.title: Best location but not much else!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of this hotel cannot be beaten for being at the very centre of down town and all its convenience. That comment is based on the experience of previously staying at the Banff International, Irwin's Mountain Inn, and having trekked up to the Banff Springs twice during this stay.
reviews.title: Good Quality Hotel - Excellent Location

reviews.text: If you ski, there is a bus stop at the hotel rear. If you decide that eating or drinking is important, you just need to cross the road (Banff Ave). If shopping is your thing, you are surrounded by it!
reviews.title: Well Situated

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 3 nights after a trip around USA. We were celebrting our honeymoon and were stoked to be upgraded on arrival to a suite. The suite was massive! It had a kitchenette, a lounge room with comfy chairs and a big plasma, a huge bathroom with a makeup bench, double sinks, spa bath and a large shower and the bedroom had a king bed, bathrobes and another plasma TV. This was by far our favourite room through our whole holiday. We had a view over the main street and out to the snow covered mountains.
reviews.title: Our favourite place

likes.liked: — The room and the friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were sooooo friendly, especially Catherine at the front desk. We ate at Tony Roma's which was nice and the staff there were great too. We were made to feel so welcome. The parking was free which was an added bonus.
reviews.title: Check for road construction before making reservation

likes.liked: — Located in the center of town
likes.disliked: — Hotel rate is relatively expensive considering the road is under construction

reviews.text: The location is great, right in town near all the shops, restuarants and pubs. We loved Banff, it was such a lovely quaint place with lots to do in the surrounding areas. We loved our time here and strongly recommend it to others.
reviews.title: Reasonable hotel in central location
Not up to standard
reviews.text: We thought this would be the hotel with best view of downtown due to its central location. It is located in the center of the town, what we did not know is the main road where the hotel located is completely

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: demolished due to major construction and closed for traffic. People are still able to walk the sideways and stores are open for business, but the view obviously does not look the one pictured in website. Construction vehicles and dust are everywhere and the construction itself has been ongoing since May 2007 when we arrived in August 2007.
reviews.title: Thank you to the Mount Royal Hotel, we loved you!!!

reviews.text: We stayed here as part of a tour and it was the worst hotel I have ever stayed at.
reviews.title: Will not stay here again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The housekeeper didn't even made out beds, she just threw the bedspread over wrinkled sheets and blanket. The hotel staff was even worse. The concierge was harder to spot than wildlife in the park: they were never at the desk when they were supposed to. The front desk personnel didn't know the answer to basic question such as "At what time does the local bank open?" or "Where is the bus stop?". Am I pretending too much here?!
reviews.title: Great location, mediocre managment

reviews.text: The waiters at the restaurant Tony Roma (part of the hotel) were forgetful and the service slow. September 12th is towards the end of the season, if this is how they are when is not busy, imagine in July and August what kind of service you get!
reviews.title: Center of Town, Well situated

likes.disliked: — Noisy rooms - but not from the outside.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Mount Royal for one night in June.
reviews.title: Will not return

likes.liked: — Located in the center of Main Street Banff-good location

reviews.text: Thank goodness it was only one night!!
reviews.title: Good hotel in excellant location

reviews.text: When we checked in, we were given our room key with room 453 marked on the tag. We get into the elevator, but the hotel only has 3 floors. Ok, so we get off on floor 3 thinking possibly the "4"'s are somewhere on the 3rd floor.....but nope none to be found. So we returned to the front desk. The girl looked at us blankly, and had to ask another worker where our room was!! And, well, the hotel doesn't actually have a fourth floor as such, its just an area above the third floor with 3 rooms on it, and to get to it you have to travel down to the end of the 3rd floor hallway, carry your bags up a 1/2 flight of stairs, take another elevator that is somewhat hidden around a few corners, and finally access your room, which by the way would make any Super 8 look like a five star resort. Old and tired doesn't even begin to describe this room. Ancient, worn out, fly infested and like something out of the Twilight Zone would be a better fit. And for $250.00-VERY POOR
reviews.title: Great value in the heart of Banff

reviews.text: Stayed at the Mount Royal Hotel for two nights as part of a tour of the Canadian and American Rockies. Overall this is a good hotel - lovely large, clean room - only thing lacking perhaps was a fridge in the room to keep water/drinks cold as it was over 90 degrees outside.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: We had a street front room on the third floor and never heard any noise although the town was very busy.
reviews.title: Good Location but Mount Royal could do better if tried a bit more.

description: In the heart of Banff, the Mount Royal Hotel offers 135, comfortably appointed and recently renovated guest rooms. All rooms have air-conditioning, cable television, coffee maker, alarm clock, in-room electronic safe and iron/board & board, as well as our standard amenities.
